pr_title: Enable binary data type TCK tests

timeline.message: Enable binary data type TCK tests
Enable binary data type TCK tests
Enable binary data type TCK tests

timeline.bodyText: Why not just add "return clazz == Numeric.class" to canConvert in ClientTypes?  Is there a case where ClientTypes is a BIT, CHAR or LONGVARCHAR and you want to return a Numeric class only if it is not one of those types?
timeline.author: gjwatts

replies.bodyText: right, the other types like CHAR, LONGVARCHAR, DATE, TIME, (and in the future BLOB and CLOB) won't be convertable to Numeric
replies.author: aguibert

timeline.bodyText: Should we add a check to make sure the passed in i >= 0?  Or are we guaranteed a value that is 0+
timeline.author: gjwatts

replies.bodyText: Good catch, I think this method will eventually be an SPI so I'll add the check in a follow-on PR
replies.author: aguibert
